question: In the following question, one part of the sentence may have an error. Find out which part of the sentence has an error and click the button corresponding to it. If the sentence is free from error, click the No error option.Which dress is the best of the two that I have shown you
option1: Which dress is the best of
answerDescription1: While comparing things the comparative degree adjective should be used, not the superlative, so here it should be &lsquo;<em>Which dress is the better of</em>&rsquo;, hence option 1 has the error.

question: Select the related letters from the given alternative. \nBDFH : JLNP : : RTVX : ?
When a number is increased by 24, it becomes 110% of itself. What is the number?
When a number is increased by 19, it becomes 200% of itself. What is the number?
